TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToleranceMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Modes in which the tolerance value for a comparison can be interpreted.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ToleranceMode Linear = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The tolerance is used as a numeric range within which two compared values are considered to be equal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ToleranceMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tolerance was created with a value, without specifying how the value would be used. This is used to prevent setting the mode more than once and is generally changed to Linear upon execution of the test.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ToleranceMode Percent = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Interprets the tolerance as the percentage by which the two compared values my deviate from each other.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ToleranceMode Ulps = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Compares two values based in their distance in representable numbers.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
